credentials.message: 사용자의 인증서가 만료되었습니다, 로그아웃 한 뒤 다시 로그인 해주세요.

cx-bottle-not-found.message: "{{bottle_name}}" CrossOver bottle 이 없어 시작 할 수 없습니다!
cx-bottle-not-found.title: CrossOver bottle 없음

diskspace.message: 사용 가능한 디스크 공간이 충분하지 않습니다
diskspace.title: 공간 없음

dxvk.message: DXVK/VKD3D를 설치하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다! 연결을 확인하세요!
dxvk.title: DXVK/VKD3D 오류

folder-not-found.title: 게임 폴더가 삭제된 것 같습니다, 설치 목록에서 게임을 제거 하겠습니까?

uncaught-exception.message: A uncaught exception occured:{{newLine}}{{error}}{{newLine}}{{newLine}} Report the exception on our Github repository.
uncaught-exception.title: 잡히지 않은 예외 발생!

update.message: 업데이트에 문제가 발생했습니다. 로그를 확인하거나 나중에 다시 시도하세요!
update.title: Update Error

wine-not-found.invalid: The selected wine version was not found. Install it or select a different version in the game's settings{{newline}}Version: {{version}}{{newline}}Path: {{path}}
wine-not-found.message: Wine 버전이 선택되지 않았습니다. 게임 설정을 확인하세요!
wine-not-found.title: Wine을 찾을 수 없음

winetricks.message: Winetricks returned the following error during execution:{{newLine}}{{error}}
winetricks.title: Winetricks error

quit.message: 보류 중인 작업 있습니다, 계속 하시겠습니까?
quit.title: 종료

question.message: Heroic을 정말 리셋하시겠습니까? 모든 설정과 캐시를 삭제하지만 설치된 게임이나 Epic 인증은 삭제되지 않습니다. 포터블 버전 Heroic은(AppImage, WinPortable 등) 나중에 직접 재시작해야 합니다.
question.title: Reset Heroic

shortcuts.message: 바탕 화면 및 시작 메뉴에 바로 가기가 생성되었습니다
shortcuts.message-mac: Shortcuts were created on the Applications folder
shortcuts.message-remove: 데스크톱 및 시작 메뉴에서 바로 가기가 제거되었습니다
shortcuts.message-remove-mac: Shortcuts were removed from the Applications folder
shortcuts.title: 바로가기

install.message: Visual C++ 런타임 다운로드 링크를 열었습니다. x86, x64 버전 모두 설치해 주세요.

notfound.message: 일부 게임에 필요한 Microsoft Visual C++ 런타임이 설치되지 않았습니다
notfound.title: VC 런타임 설치되지 않음

epic.import: 현재 Epic 서버에 큰 장애가 발생하여 게임을 가져올 수 없습니다!
epic.install: 현재 Epic 서버에 큰 장애가 발생하여 게임을 설치할 수 없습니다!
epic.update: 현재 Epic 서버에 큰 장애가 발생하여 게임을 업데이트할 수 없습니다!

epic.offline-notification-body: Epic Games 서버가 오프라인 상태이므로 온라인 서비스가 완전히 작동하지 않을 수 있습니다!

error.component: 게임을 찾을 수 없습니다, 로그아웃했다가 다시 로그인하거나 아래 옵션 중 하나를 시도하세요

help.amdfsr: AMD's FSR helps boost framerate by upscaling lower resolutions in Fullscreen Mode. Image quality increases from 5 to 1 at the cost of a slight performance hit. Enabling may improve performance.
help.custom_themes_path: Do not use CSS files from untrusted sources. When in doubt, ask for a review in our Discord channel.
help.custom_themes_wiki: Check the Wiki for more details on adding custom themes. Click here.
help.dxvk: DXVK is a Vulkan-based translational layer for DirectX 9, 10 and 11 games. Enabling may improve compatibility. Might cause issues especially for older DirectX games.
help.esync: Esync aims to reduce wineserver overhead in CPU-intensive games. Enabling may improve performance.
help.fsync: Fsync aims to reduce wineserver overhead in CPU-intensive games. Enabling may improve performance on supported Linux kernels.

game_language.fallback: Leave blank to use Heroic's language.
game_language.in_game_config: Not all games support this configuration, some have in-game language setting.

help.gamemode: Feral GameMode applies automatic and temporary tweaks to the system when running games. Enabling may improve performance.
help.general: Epic Games Launcher가 다른 곳에 설치되어 있고 게임을 가져와서 다시 다운로드하지 않으려면 Epic Games Launcher와 동기화 하십시오.
help.mangohud: MangoHUD is an overlay that displays and monitors FPS, temperatures, CPU/GPU load and other system resources.

other.part6: 시작 명령 후에 실행됩니다, 다음 예시와 같습니다:
other.part7: 일부 게임 등에서 런처를 건너 뜁니다.

help.preferSystemLibs: Custom Wine versions (Wine-GE, Wine-Lutris) are shipped with their library dependencies. By enabling this option, these shipped libraries will be ignored and Wine will load system libraries instead. Warning! Issues may occur if dependencies are not met.
help.primerun: Use dedicated graphics card to render game on multi-GPU systems. Only needed on gaming laptops or desktops that use a headless GPU for rendering (NVIDIA Optimus, AMD CrossFire)

steam_path.info: This path lets Heroic determine what version of Proton Steam uses, for adding non-Steam games to Steam.

help.steamruntime: Custom libraries provided by Steam to help run Linux and Windows (Proton) games. Enabling might improve compatibility.

sync.part1: Heroic은 올바른 저장 폴더를 찾으려고 시도하며 대부분의 경우에 작동합니다. 폴더가 잘못된 경우 재정의 상자를 사용하여 변경하세요.
sync.part2: Wine 또는 Proton의 접두사 폴더를 변경하면 Proton은 다른 접두사(/pfx)와 사용자 이름(steamuser)을 사용하므로 경로를 다시 확인해야 합니다. 따라서 현재 경로를 지우고 동기화 설정 페이지에서 나갔다 돌아오면 Heroic이 올바른 접두사로 폴더를 다시 찾을 수 있습니다.
sync.part3: 수동 동기화: 다운로드를 선택하여 클라우드에 저장된 게임 세이브을 다운로드합니다. 로컬 항목을 클라우드에 업로드하려면 업로드를 선택합니다. 강제 다운로드 및 강제 업로드는 로컬 또는 클라우드에 있는 버전을 무시합니다.
sync.part4: 세이브 동기화는 게임을 시작하거나 종료할 때 마다 자동으로 동기화 합니다.

help.vkd3d: VKD3D is a Vulkan-based translational layer for DirectX 12 games. Enabling may improve compatibility significantly. Has no effect on older DirectX games.

wine.part1: Heroric은 다음 폴더에서 Wine, Proton, 그리고 CrossOver 의 버전을 검색합니다:
wine.part2: 다른 경로의 경우에는, 이 폴더 중 하나에 심볼릭 링크를 사용하세요

save-sync.searching: Trying to detect the correct save folder

wine-repfix.message: Wine uses what is called a WINEPREFIX to encapsulate Windows applications. This prefix contains the Wine configuration files and a reproduction of the file hierarchy of C: (the main disk on a Windows OS). In this reproduction of the C: drive, your game save files and dependencies installed via winetricks are stored.

login.message: Login with your platform. You can login to more than one platform at the same time.

steam.corrupt: {{game}} could not be added to all found Steam users. See logs for more info. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.success: {{game}} was successfully added to Steam. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.title: Added to Steam

steam.corrupt: {{game}} could not be removed from all found Steam users. See logs for more info. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.success: {{game}} was successfully removed from Steam. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.title: Removed from Steam

notify.new-heroic-version: A new Heroic version was released!

refresh.error: Couldn't fetch releases from upstream, maybe because of Github API restrictions! Try again later.

offline-message.hint: We are checking the connectivity against:{{newline}}github.com,{{newline}}gog.com and{{newline}}store.epicgames.com

error.equal_sign_in_key: Variable names can't contain the "=" sign

env_variables.example: Do NOT include the "=" sign, e.g: for a setting like "MY_FLAG=123", set MY_FLAG in NAME and 123 in VALUE.
env_variables.info: Set environment variables to append to the command.

options.quote-args-with-spaces: Warning: Make sure to quote args with spaces! E.g.: "path/with spaces/"

placeholder.custom_themes_path: Select the path to look for custom CSS files

setting.alt-legendary-bin: 대신 사용할 Legendary 바이너리 파일 선택
setting.checkForUpdatesOnStartup: Check for Heroic Updates on Startup
setting.defaultWinePrefix: 새로운 Wine 접두사를 위한 폴더 설정
setting.download-no-https: Download games without HTTPS (useful for CDNs e.g. LanCache)
setting.enableFSRHack: FSR 활성화 (지원하는 Wine 버전을 사용해야 합니다)

eosOverlay.notInstalled: The EOS Overlay is not installed
eosOverlay.notInstalledMsg: The EOS Overlay is not installed. Do you want to install it now?
eosOverlay.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to uninstall the EOS Overlay?

setting.gamemode: GameMode 사용 (Feral Game Mode가 설치되어 있어야 합니다)

log.instructions: Join our Discord and look for the channel that matches your operating system. Share the content of the logs displayed here, and include a clear description of the problem with any relevant information and details.

confirmation.message: Only one graphics card was detected in this system. Please note that this option is intended for multi-GPU systems with headless GPUs (like laptops). On single-GPU systems, the GPU is automatically used & enabling this option can cause issues. Do you really want to enable this option?
confirmation.title: Only 1 GPU detected

savefolder.not-found: Save folder not found, please select it manually
savefolder.warning: Please check twice if the path is correct

settings.default_hint: Changes in this section only apply as default values when installing games. If you want to change the settings of an already installed game, use the Settings button in the game page.

gameModeRequired.message: GameMode is required for the EAC runtime to work on Flatpak. Do you want to enable it now?
gameModeRequired.title: GameMode required

eacRuntimeEnabled.message: The EAC runtime is enabled, which won't function correctly without GameMode. Do you want to disable the EAC Runtime and GameMode?
eacRuntimeEnabled.title: EAC runtime enabled

saves.label: Save Location:
saves.warning: Cloud Saves feature is in Beta, please backup your saves before syncing (in case something goes wrong)

status.processing: 파일을 처리 중입니다 잠시만 기다려 주십시오

settings.default-wineprefix: 새로운 구성을 위한 기본 접두사 폴더 선택하기

two_col_table.save_hint: Changes in this table are not saved automatically. Click the + button
